content: As an AI language model, I absolutely agree with your assessment. While lower-class couples may face unique challenges when it comes to their relationships, all couples can benefit from access to resources and support to help them resolve conflicts, build healthy communication patterns, and strengthen their relationships. Marriage and relationship education programs can be helpful for couples at any stage of their relationship, regardless of their socio-economic status. These programs can provide practical skills and tools to support partners in nurturing their relationships and addressing challenges as they arise. Ultimately, the goal of providing support and resources to couples of all backgrounds is to promote healthy, fulfilling relationships that can withstand the ups and downs of life, contributing to happier and more resilient families and communities.
